summary: Krampus is a mythical creature from Alpine folklore. He looks like a horned man and visits children with Saint Nicholas on December 5th. While Saint Nicholas gives gifts to good kids, Krampus scares and punishes the naughty ones. No one is sure where Krampus came from, but some think he has ancient roots. Today, people dress up as Krampus in parades and festivals, and his image is popular in holiday cards and American media.
title: Krampus
